trans-unit.source: Represents a control that provides a scroll bar that has a sliding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> whose position corresponds to a value.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo que fornece uma barra de deslocamento que tenha um deslizante <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> cuja posição corresponde a um valor.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a ScrollBar control.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração seguinte mostra um controlo de barra de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: ![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") The ScrollBar control contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: ![Ilustração de ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "ilustração da barra de deslocamento") ScrollBar o controlo contém um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control consists of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controlo é composta por um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controlo e dois <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: You can increase and decrease the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the ScrollBar control by pressing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls or by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Pode aumentar e diminuir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>propriedade do controlo ScrollBar, premindo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>controlos ou movendo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default range of values for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property is from 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo predefinido de valores para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>propriedade é de 0 a 1.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> represents the linear distance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> between the endpoints of the ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>representa a distância linear do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>entre os pontos finais da barra de deslocamento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the default range of values by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode alterar o intervalo predefinido de valores, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A> property determines whether the ScrollBar is displayed horizontally or vertically, and you must define this property for the ScrollBar control to appear.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A>propriedade determina se a barra de deslocamento é apresentada na horizontal ou verticalmente, e tem de definir esta propriedade para o controlo de barra de deslocamento a aparecer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a ScrollBar is oriented so that values increase from top to bottom for a vertical ScrollBar or from left to right for a horizontal ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>numa barra de deslocamento está orientado para que os valores aumentam a partir da parte superior para parte inferior de uma barra de deslocamento vertical ou da esquerda para a direita para uma barra de deslocamento horizontal.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties in the following table are the binding targets for the corresponding ScrollBar properties when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property is not explicitly defined.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>Propriedades na tabela a seguir são os destinos de enlace para as propriedades de ScrollBar correspondentes quando a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>propriedade não está definida explicitamente.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly define the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property, the binding does not occur.
trans-unit.target: Se definir explicitamente o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>propriedade, o enlace não ocorrer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>

trans-unit.source: |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property|ScrollBar property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| You can access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control of a ScrollBar control by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>| Propriedade de ScrollBar | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Pode aceder a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controlo de um controlo de ScrollBar utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: To display <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> content inside a box that has scroll bars, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>conteúdo dentro de uma caixa que tenha barras de deslocamento, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ScrollBar Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ScrollBar controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Personalizar a barra de deslocamento controlo para aplicar as mesmas definições de propriedade para controlos de ScrollBar múltiplas, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Pode modificar a predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para lhe dar controlo um aspeto exclusivo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo de existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ScrollBar, see [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e Estados que são específicos para a barra de deslocamento, consulte [estilos de barra de deslocamento e modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controlo podem ser definidas pelo estilo de predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo predefinido, a propriedade poderá alterar o valor predefinido do quando o controlo é apresentado na aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo predefinido é determinado pelo qual tema de ambiente de trabalho é utilizado quando a aplicação está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [predefinido o WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ScrollBar control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definir uma propriedade visual apenas terá um efeito se essa propriedade ambos presentes no modelo de deslocamento do controlo predefinido e é definida através da utilização de um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na secção "Alterar o Visual estrutura de um controlo" [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The command that notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> that the user is dragging the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> of the horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> to the value that is provided in <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.
trans-unit.target: O comando que notifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> que o utilizador é arrastar o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> do horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> para o valor que é fornecido na <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the thumb of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> for the DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador arrasta o botão de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>chamadas <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>para o DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes that command.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>devolve `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>executa este comando.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>devolve `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>executa <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> uses this command to enable deferred scrolling.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>utiliza este comando para ativar o deslocamento diferida.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true` and a user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> does not change until the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é `true` e um utilizador arrasta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>o conteúdo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>não alterar até que o utilizador liberta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If deferred scrolling is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand for a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Se deslocar diferida estiver ativada, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>executa DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand para um horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>quando o utilizador arrasta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: This implementation sets IsEnabledCore to `true` only if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação define IsEnabledCore para `true` apenas se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>valor o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>é maior do que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>valor e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>está ativada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> is enabled in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> and the size of the content is larger than the display area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> está ativado num <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> e o tamanho do conteúdo é maior do que a área de apresentação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The command that scrolls a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> by a small amount in the vertical direction of increasing value of its <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O comando que desloca um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> por uma pequena quantidade na vertical direção de aumentar o valor do respetivo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This command increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este comando aumenta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>pelo valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: This command occurs when the user presses the DOWN ARROW key.
trans-unit.target: Este comando ocorre quando o utilizador premir a tecla de seta para baixo.

trans-unit.source: When you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> executes this command.

trans-unit.source: A typical style template for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control includes a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is surrounded on either side by two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> controls.
trans-unit.target: Um modelo de estilo típicas para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controlo inclui um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controlo que está rodeado em ambos os lados por dois <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> that is used with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> que é utilizado com um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade de conteúdo deslocável atualmente visível.

trans-unit.source: The units that are used for ViewportSize are the same units that are used to describe the length of the content.
trans-unit.target: As unidades que são utilizadas para ViewportSize são as mesmas unidades que são utilizadas para descrever o comprimento do conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Some examples include lines of text or pages of text.
trans-unit.target: Alguns exemplos incluem páginas de texto ou linhas de texto.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control that is displayed as the sliding value indicator in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade ViewportSize é utilizado para calcular o tamanho do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controlo é apresentado como o indicador de valor deslizante num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control's size represents the amount of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>tamanho do controlo representa a quantidade de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>conteúdo do controlo está visível.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: If 25 percent of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content is visible, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> occupies 25 percent of the track in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Se 25 por cento de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>conteúdo do controlo está visível, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>ocupar 25 por cento dos controlar no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: You can decide which units ViewportSize uses.
trans-unit.target: Pode decidir que unidades ViewportSize utiliza.

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, make sure that the ViewportSize, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties use the same units.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade, certifique-se de que o ViewportSize <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>Propriedades utilizam as mesmas unidades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> size reflects the amount of content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: A seguinte ilustração mostra como as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>tamanho reflete a quantidade de conteúdo que está visível.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>
